# Using pandas library we load each CSV file separately and assign it a name

Survey_Discr = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/lgbt-survey-discrimination/LGBT_Survey_Discrimination.csv')

HS_EU = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/hs-eu-happiness/HS_EU (2).csv')

Rainbow_Score = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/ilga-rainbow-score/ILGA_Rainbow_Score.csv')

Violence_Harassment = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/lgbtviolence-harassment/LGBT_Survey_ViolenceAndHarassment.csv')

Marriage_Legalization = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/marriage-legalization/Marriage_Legalization.csv')

Populism_Votes = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/populism-vote-share/Populism_Vote_Share.csv')

df_lgbtqi = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/combined-df-eu/Combined_DF_EU-Index-LGBTQI (3).csv')

df_lgbtqi_edit = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/combined-df-eu-edit/Combined_DF_EU-Index-LGBTQI EDITED.csv')

df_lgbtqi_2012 = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/combined-df-eu-ilga-2012/Combined_DF_EU-Index-LGBTQI ILGA 2012.csv')

Populism_Votes_Edit = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/populism-votes-edit-2/Populism_Vote_Share_EDIT.csv')

Populism_Votes_Edit3 = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/populism-vote-share/Populism_Vote_Share.csv')

source.8e1387cc:
world = gpd.read_file(gpd.datasets.get_path('naturalearth_lowres'))
world = world.rename(columns={"name": "Country"})
test = pd.merge(world,df_lgbtqi_edit,on=['Country'],how='left')
test = test.dropna()
test = test.sort_values(by=['Year']).reset_index()

test.loc[test.Country == 'France', 'iso_a3'] = "FRA"
test.loc[test.Country == 'Norway', 'iso_a3'] = "NOR"

fig = px.choropleth(test, locations="iso_a3",
                    color="Timbro", # lifeExp is a column of gapminder
                    hover_name="Country",# column to add to hover information
                    animation_frame='Year',
                    color_continuous_scale=px.colors.sequential.Plasma,
                    width=1200, height=800,
                    title = 'Populism (%) in the EU')
fig.update_coloraxes(cmin=0, cmax=50) 
fig.update_traces(colorbar_nticks=10, selector=dict(type='choropleth'))
fig.show()

source.9cd50a60: ### As all colors turn brighter it shows that Populism is on the rise in Europe.
source.ef4f9ea0:
# LGBT Survey - Populism in the EU Tasks:
  • Exploratory Data Analysis
  • Graph and Analyze

    The project has the following DataSets, related to LGBTQI:

  • Kaggle Set - LGBTQI Violence and Harassment
  • ILGA Europe Index
  • GTI Index
  • HDI
  • Happiness Score
  • Populism Index in EU

    Topics to Cover:

  • T-Test
  • Chi-Square / Goodness of Fit
  • ANOVA

    Scope:

  • Compare the sets against different variables to find correlations.

    Hypothesis Definition:

  • Populism Vote Share in EU, higher percentage change from 2012 – 2020.

    CONTENTS:

  • 1. Load Data
  • 2. Populism in the EU
  • 3.
  • 4.
